long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you visit an iOS App link in your browser, it's a pain to then open your mobile device and search for the app.

With this extension, that's no longer the case! A QR code will show bottom right, with which you then point your mobile phone's camera to, and bam! You get linked to the app store.
